MODULE.name: Signature
MODULE.HELP_OVERVIEW: creates a rectangular box within which the user can draw by using a finger or the device's stylus to record handwritten data. Common usages for this tag include the capture of client/customer signatures and the input of handwritten text/notations.

PROPERTIES.DESC: These properties are used to configure the appearance and the behaviour of the signature capture area.

PROPERTY.name: compressionFormat
PROPERTY.DESC: Compression format of the image file for the captured signature.
PROPERTY.APPLIES: JPG and PNG compression are not supported on Windows devices, BMP will always be used.

PROPERTY.name: outputFormat
PROPERTY.DESC: The return type of the saved signature capture image.

VALUE.DESC: Outputs the signature capture image into an image file. The compression method and extension of the image file can be specified in compressionFormat.
Outputs the signature capture image as a DataURI string.

PROPERTY.name: name
PROPERTY.DESC: The filename in which to store the signature image, if OUTPUT_FORMAT_IMAGE is used. The file extension is determined by the compressionFormat used.

PROPERTY.name: border
PROPERTY.DESC: Shows or hides a border for the rectangular capture area. Not applicable to fullscreen signature capture area.

PROPERTY.name: penColor
PROPERTY.DESC: RGB or RGBA value that sets the color of the stylus pen ink using HTML web colors.

PROPERTY.name: penWidth
PROPERTY.DESC: Sets the width of the pen line in pixels.

PROPERTY.name: bgColor
PROPERTY.DESC: RGB or RGBA value that sets the background color of the signature capture area.

PROPERTY.name: left
PROPERTY.DESC: The coordinates in pixels of the left side of the signature capture area. Not applicable to fullscreen signature capture area.

PROPERTY.name: top
PROPERTY.DESC: The coordinates in pixels of the top side of the signature capture area. Not applicable to fullscreen signature capture area.

PROPERTY.name: width
PROPERTY.DESC: The width of the signature capture area in pixels. Not applicable to fullscreen signature capture area.

PROPERTY.name: height
PROPERTY.DESC: The height of the signature capture area in pixels. Not applicable to fullscreen signature capture area.

PROPERTY.name: fullScreen
PROPERTY.DESC: Sets whether the signature capture area should be fullscreen (true) or inline (false).

METHOD.name: takeFullScreen
METHOD.DESC: Shows a signature area. The callback is fired when the signature is closed (when in fullscreen) or when capture is called.

PARAM.name: propertyMap
PARAM.DESC: Map of signature properties to be set

PARAM.name: status
PARAM.DESC: Whether a signature was captured or the signature capture area was dismissed (Fullscreen version only). Possible values:'ok' or 'cancel'

PARAM.name: imageUri
PARAM.DESC: If the outputFormat is "image", this will be the URI of the captured signature image. If the outputFormat is "dataUri", this will be the DataURI representation of the captured signature image.

PARAM.name: propertyMap
PARAM.DESC: Map of signature properties to be set

METHOD.name: capture
METHOD.DESC: Captures the signature area as an image.

PARAM.name: status
PARAM.DESC: Whether a signature was captured or the signature capture area was dismissed (Fullscreen version only). Possible values:'ok' or 'cancel'

PARAM.name: imageUri
PARAM.DESC: If the outputFormat is "image", this will be the URI of the captured signature image. If the outputFormat is "dataUri", this will be the DataURI representation of the captured signature image.

METHOD.name: hide
METHOD.DESC: Hides the signature capture area from view but doesnt clear the inputed signature data. In a hidden state, a user cannot interact with the signature capture area

METHOD.name: setVectorCallback
METHOD.DESC: Signature data is formatted into a series of vectors and returned to the application via this callback function. The received data may not represent the entire signature as the vectors will be sent in batches if the signature is large. A single vector (array entry) contains an X, Y coordinate and the beginning / end of the signature is defined by (65535, 65535). This callback is independent of the callback of the capture method, when specified the callback will be called whenever a 'pen up' occurs in the signature box.

CALLBACK.DESC: Not providing a callback will result in the vector callback being cleared

PARAM.name: vectorArray
PARAM.DESC: JavaScript array of vectors which represent the signature.

MODULE.USER_OVERVIEW:
Fullscreen and Inline ===================== The signature capture feature can work in two visual modes, Fullscreen and Inline. The fullscreen variant has buttons to capture, clear and cancel the signature capture box, so the methods: "clear", "hide", "capture" don't need to be used. Whereas with the inline signature capture, there are no such buttons so these will have to be designed into the app itself.
Parameters which clear the signature ==================================== The signature capture area is designed to be set up prior to capturing the signature, as such the following parameters will clear any current signature: "width", "height", "penColor", "bgColor".
